edge: The director of the movie 'What's Your Raashee?' is Gowariker.
Sohail Sen, a newcomer at that time, was chosen by Gowariker to compose the soundtrack for 'What's Your Raashee?'.
Initially, Gowariker wanted to hire A. R. Rahman for 'What's Your Raashee?', but he was busy with other projects at that time.
Twelve songs in the album represent the different zodiac signs.
Twelve different themes were created, using a different instrument for each zodiac sign, depicting the traits and personality of each girl.
Sen found composing 'Chehra Jo Dekhe Hain' most difficult, as he had to merge all the themes of the other twelve songs into one.
Alka Yagnik provided vocals for some of the songs in the album.
Udit Narayan provided vocals for some of the songs in the album.
Shaan provided vocals for some of the songs in the album.
Madhushree provided vocals for some of the songs in the album.
Bela Shende provided vocals for some of the songs in the album.
Pamela Jain provided vocals for some of the songs in the album.
Bhavya Pandit provided vocals for some of the songs in the album.
Tarannum Mallik provided vocals for some of the songs in the album.
Sen performs most of the songs in the soundtrack.
Javed Akhtar wrote thirteen original songs for the album.
